it.tdlight.jni.TdApi.LinkPreviewOptions

  • Uses of TdApi.LinkPreviewOptions in it.tdlight.jni

    Fields in it.tdlight.jni declared as TdApi.LinkPreviewOptions
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    TdApi.LinkPreviewOptions
    TdApi.GetWebPagePreview.linkPreviewOptions
    Options to be used for generation of the link preview; pass null to use default link preview options.
    TdApi.LinkPreviewOptions
    TdApi.InputMessageText.linkPreviewOptions
    Options to be used for generation of a link preview; may be null if none; pass null to use default link preview options.
    TdApi.LinkPreviewOptions
    TdApi.MessageText.linkPreviewOptions
    Options which were used for generation of the link preview; may be null if default options were used.
